chapter.title: Anyframe IAM Technical Specification
chapter.para: Technical specification for applying the Anyframe IAM is the followings.

listitem.para: Core Framework : Anyframe Java - Core FrameworkSpring Framework(or Spring Framework based Framework)
Web Framework : Anyframe Java - Web Framework (or SpringMVC based Web framework)

chapter.para: Currently 1.0.0 version limits providing a tag library supporting for controlling of Presentation Layer to JSP only and adding function for each UI product will be supported after judging the market condition. Authorization controlling based on Struts Framework is not supported at Anyframe IAM.
